definition: flank (the side of one's torso)/to coerce/to threaten
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing

sentences.english: The responses of tomato seedling to water stress using tensiometer were studied.
sentences.chinese: 水分胁迫对番茄幼苗的生长有严重的抑制作用。

sentences.english: The drought stress could be represented by drought index, which varied greatly for each year.
sentences.chinese: 干旱胁迫压力可由干燥度指数代替，年际间变化很大。

sentences.english: Construction of fictional views of reality that the populace is coerced into believing.
sentences.chinese: 描写大众被胁迫去相信对现实虚构观点。

sentences.english: Middle degree of water stree was the limit of non-damage apricot leaves.
sentences.chinese: 中度胁迫中期是叶片不受失水伤害的极限。

sentences.english: One debt collector in Spain uses public shaming a tool of coercion.
sentences.chinese: 一名西班牙讨债者也正在使用公开羞辱作为胁迫工具。

sentences.english: This may, in part, be a result of the ability of muscular men to intimidate 97lb weaklings.
sentences.chinese: 部份原因是，肌肉强劲的人容易胁迫97磅的弱小者。

sentences.english: The research was to study the antidotal effect of Zn on pea seedling under Hg stress.
sentences.chinese: 研究锌对汞胁迫下豌豆幼苗的解毒效应。

sentences.english: Obviously, submersed mcrophytes were under the stress of copper.
sentences.chinese: 说明了铜离子对沉水植物的生长产生了明显的胁迫。

sentences.english: If any were bald enough to object, he would threaten them with the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 倘若有人敢于反抗，他就以日本人的淫威相胁迫。

sentences.english: All the results showed that the submergence tolerance ability of hybrid rice is superior to traditional rice.
sentences.chinese: 杂交稻耐淹涝胁迫的能力强于常规稻。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic physiology and correlative physiological indexes of Phyllitis japonica responsed to the different degrees of drought treatment significantly.
sentences.chinese: 干旱胁迫对对开蕨光合及生理指标产生显著影响。

sentences.english: Heavy metals can occur the large-scale cell death of tobacco suspension cultures.
sentences.chinese: 镉胁迫会造成烟草悬浮细胞大规模死亡。

sentences.english: NaCl stress inhibited the differentiation of callus and plant regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 盐胁迫抑制了愈伤组织的分化和植株再生。

sentences.english: But it is difficult to settle or even discuss these problems in an atmosphere of intimidation .
sentences.chinese: 但在被胁迫的气氛中很难解决或甚至讨论这些问题。

definition: to use gain as a lure
to kidnap/to hijack/to abduct/to hold under duress
forced submission/to exploit advantage to force sb to do one's bidding
to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
